org.jenkinsci.plugins.pipeline.modeldefi.value:
""" ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no deploy@${env.CLIENT_DEPLOY_CONTAINER}-test -p 22 ' rm -rf /app/mobil-webshop-client cd /app
git clone ${env.CLIENT_GITHUB_REPO} cd /app/mobil-webshop-client git checkout ${BRANCH}
yes | cp -rf /app/environment.ts /app/mobil-webshop-client/src/environments/environment.ts yes | cp -rf /app/environment.ts /app/mobil-webshop-client/src/environments/environment.development.ts
npm install pm2 -f start /app/ecosystem.config.js ' """
